Uses of Interface
de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.AdapterListener

  • Packages that use AdapterListener 
    Package Description
    de.mrapp.android.preference.activity  
    de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter  

    • Uses of AdapterListener in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity

      Classes in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity that implement AdapterListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PreferenceActivity
      An activity, which provides a navigation for multiple groups of preferences, in which each group is represented by an instance of the class PreferenceHeader.

    • Uses of AdapterListener in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter

      Methods in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter with parameters of type AdapterListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PreferenceHeaderAdapter.addListener(AdapterListener listener)
      Adds a new listener, which should be notified, when the underlying data of the adapter has been changed, to the adapter.
      void PreferenceHeaderAdapter.removeListener(AdapterListener listener)
      Removes a specific listener, which should not be notified anymore, when the underlying data of the adapter has been changed, from the adapter.
